text.__SUMMARY__:
Solanum ensifolium is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae endemic to Puerto Rico. Commonly known as Erubia, it is nearly extinct due to habitat loss.Synonyms
Solanum drymophilum O.E.Schulz
Solanum longifolium Pav. ex DunalSolanum congestiflorum var. longifolium is S. crispum
Solanum longifolium of Sessé & Mociño actually refers to the S. muricatum of Aiton.
Solanum longifolium of Dunal is Solanum subinerme.
Solanum nudum var. longifolium refers to S. sieberi
text.Footnotes:
Solanaceae Source (20 November 2013). "Solanum ensifolium". Retrieved 20 May 2014.
World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum ensifolium". IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.2. International Union for Conservation of Nature. Retrieved 20 May 2014.
